Everyone who has the "Not a valid SREP compressed file" error, open your torrent client & the folder where the files are being downloaded to. Remove all part files that might have been leftover. Go to the torrent client and check if you have skipped any files, if you have, set their priority to normal so that they download. Then do a force re-check on the torrent. Should find whatever parts are missing & finish downloading them. Before launching setup.exe, close all AV programs. Worked for me :)
